text: Washington Column is a roughly 1800-foot high rock formation, arising from Yosemite Valley. It is east of the Royal Arches, behind the Ahwahnee Hotel. North Dome is above it. Washington Column can be viewed from many points in Yosemite Valley, including the trail to Mirror Lake. Washington Column has numerous rock climbing routes. ==References== ==External links and references== * Climbing on Washington Column * More on climbing Washington Column * Summitpost on Washington Column Category:Landforms of Yosemite National Park Category:Granite formations Category:Rock formations of California Category:Climbing areas of California
title: Washington Column
